author: JHiltbrand
body:
#### PR description:

When making HCAL LUT XML payloads with the `HcalLutManager`, avoid the FSC channels which masquerade as ZDC EM. These channels are only on the DAQ pipeline and do not contribute to trigger primitives / ZDCSums, and by extension they have no LUT payload to be loaded on-detector. Therefore, the `HcalLutMetadata` is used to cleanly avoid them while making the LUT XML. This avoidance mechanism actually generalizes for any ZDC channels: they must be in the `HcalLutMetadata` condition for a LUT to be made.

 **N.B.** _This only affects code that is run manually offline. This code is not used in any reconstruction workflow._

#### PR validation:

Ran offline in standard LUT production workflow and confirm that code does not crash when FSC-as-ZDC-EM channels are present in the HCAL electronics map and confirmed that the output LUT XML is unchanged for everything else after including the PR code.
